name: Rocket Chicken
summary: This game is a parody on another popular game! Have you ever wondered how hard would it be for a chicken to escape from the chicken factory? No? Never mind, take a shot! This chicken is like no other chicken on the farm, she has decided to run away, and she’s gonna do it, with the rocket or without it! Don’t avoid the bomb, just jump on it to run even further!
